title: Constantly Dc'ing in game?
body:
Most of my team including me continue to dc through out the game, where as on the other team only 1 person was dc'ed? What's going on?

Edit: Think Riot has fixed it! Thank you Riot.

replies.body: yup id have 2 agree 7 of us in my game dc'd 6 times during wtf sad i was looking forward to a night of league
Yeah, me and the gf we're planning on duo queue'ing tonight, grind them games but it doesn't look great..
are u pekkato?

Honestly, I DC'd 5 times in a placement ranked game AND NOT EVEN A LOSS PREVENTED AT THE END. Utter bull. 2 other members of my team were constantly DCing at the same time as well. I'm over this. Happened in the game before but only once for a reaaaaally long time. That wasn't a loss prevented either. :/
They don't have great timing do they, especially so close to the new season to do this..

what a %%%%ing load of %%%% . I was dc'ing constantly from start to finish every 1-2 minutes. This was the same with the ally kalista and enemy ezreal and nidalee (I was amumu). I've never had this before. RITO PLS WTF not even a loss prevented and its ranked{{item:3151}}
:| Dem feels

same problem, just lost a placement game from it T_T. enemy amumu kept dcing at the exact same times I would, it's definitely on Riot's end because he's from NZ and I'm from AUS... completely different ISP's.

Happening to me too! sucks so much, can't play.

Dear riot i was gladly playing a game of ranked today, when all of a sudden me and my duo queue partner kept disconnecting from the game at the same time it wasn't internet connection issue because we were still on Skype when it happened we had to quickly exit and reconnect to the game.  I was really gutted that we lost because of this and i'm sure we're not the only ones having this problem so i'm asking for all people that played rank at this time please do something about our match history because no one deserves to lose LP over a %%%%ty sever.

All the people playing ranked aren't going to be happy... I feel your pain, so damn s**t and as Sixth stated especially when you're trying to do placements which are all the more important, as if placements aren't hard enough lol.

I lost 3 ranked games in a row cause of disconnection. I feel embarrassed and sorry for my team. I let them down. In the champ select the Gold ranked Leona gave me her most favorable role ADC and asked me not to let her down. But when the game started I could not connect and I was getting firewall error. I felt so bad that I let her down and spoiled her game. My team surrender at 20 because I was afk and one of the strongest player in the team as a strong ADC. So much tear, much wow. Nice story :)
add me kiaora love the name

Yup, everyone is getting it. On Rito's end for sure.

3 people on my team constantly spiking, d/cing and such along with 3 or 4 of the enemy team. Wouldn't normally bother me but it was ranked and we got no loss forgiven. 
I suggest giving league a break for a few hours until they sort this out.

Riot gave me 20 mins waiting queue time for 10 games because they servers are broken. My whole team was lagging even in a fricking BOTS game.

 I sent in a support ticket. I had huge discussions with their Technicians. The technicians said they are working with the internet service providers to fix this issue. They say it is a packet loss problem. Riot admits it is their fault and still they punish players for not intentionally leaving the game and also because  riots server was broken. 

I still get punished, my team gets punished for Riots fault. Can they at least manually override the leaver buster? Guess they won't cause they favor to make us suffer.

Good Job Riot. You are just making us suffer. Seriously the new leaver buster system is just focused on North American Server where the Elites live. Poor Oceania people need to have their leaver buster punishment reduced. Riot too stingy to afford good server. Riots has to start writing good codes to help maintain a healthy internet connection with the New Zealand Internet Service providers.

YOUR CUSTOMERS ARE TRYING TO MAINTAIN HEALTHY RELATIONSHIP, BUT YOU JUST PUNISH THEM FOR BY HANDING OUT SWEET LEAVERBUSTER 20MINS WAITING QUEUE.

GOOD JOB RIOT.
